title: Strategies for Fostering Creativity in Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: A curriculum that explores the concept of creativity based on phenomenological research methodologies and strengthens practical application skills through collaborative activities among learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain four core categories of creativity in the instructional design process
Learners can propose three or more creative instructional design solutions tailored to diverse educational contexts
Learners can integrate creative elements into their instructional design projects by reflecting peer feedback
Learners can analyze creative instructional design strategies for 21st-century learning environments according to evaluation criteria
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
